attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to support my lord and savior Donald J. Trump but as soon as i logged in i was teleported into the very depths of hell and only made it out alive thanks to my real savior jesus christ. 10/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: almost died

attributes.review: so when i opened the app, i saw this cheeto orange thingy so i was like, okay, maybe that was a mistake and i kept seeing it and i realized that was not a mistake. i’m actually kinda scarred and i might not recover.
attributes.title: Horrible app :(

attributes.review: If there was a zero star rating that would be more pleasing. I do not like apps that encourage ped o philia, big o try, islam o phobia, xen o phobia,Hom o phobia, and just about everything else. And the app was made terribly. Complete trash. Just like your pre sid dent.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever had !  i got the app to check on poor bunker boy .  when i opened the app , a large group of white straight cis men came to my door and started to scream “ grab her by the p*ssy “ repeatedly . THIS APP IS FOR A CULT !!  BUNKER BOY IS A CULT LEADER !!
attributes.title: bunker boy disappoints once again

attributes.review:
Bad app!!! I LOVEE my dear bunker boy more than Words can say so I was sooo sad when his app was such a disappointment. Poor little fat Donny 😭😭

attributes.title: Poor Donny

attributes.review: I have been trying to get this app to work for months now. But apparently Donald trump has better things to do like be a racist homophobic piece of actual garbage 💅🏻 and I just can’t be caught like that. Could NEVA BE ME.
attributes.title: APP DOESNT WORK

attributes.review: The app is so bad. It makes my phone laggy and crash. Whoever designed this must be a toddler cause there is no way this was done by a precessional.

attributes.review: I’ve never had so much frustration using an app. Everything was everywhere, I couldn’t tell what is what. Very messy.
